The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Friday 

Seasonal Vegetable Borscht Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (carrot, celery, zucchini, potato, white onion, tomato, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Basmati Rice with Green Lentils and Avocado Dressing – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (basmati rice, green lentils, avocado, tomato, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Corn & Red Bell Pepper Crackers Bread- raw / gluten free / 40 g (corn, red bell pepper, quinoa, flaxseed, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Alkaline Chocolate and Lemon Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (cashew, natural cocoa, alkaline cocoa, lemon, almonds, cocoa butter, curcuma, psyllium, unfiltered honey)
